original_title: ‘techno 2023’ to be held at BMICH in October 2023
original_body_lines: “techno 2023”, the national engineering and technology exhibition will be held at the Bandaranaike Memorial International Conference Hall (BMICH) on 20th, 21st & 22nd October 2023. The IESL’s premier event, techno Sri Lanka has evolved to be the largest and only engineering and technology show held yearly in Colombo since its debut in 1985. “techno” has demonstrated the methods for improving people’s living conditions and has become a great arena for industry professionals, business heads, technologists, and the general public to join together on a single platform. The exhibition is well-known for displaying the latest innovations, products, and talent from around the world to its audience over the course of three days.
